Title: Relates to continuing the early college high school program and the pathways in technology early college high school program in this state; appropriation
Summary: Relates to continuing the early college high school programs and the pathways in technology early college high school programs in this state; makes an appropriation therefor.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to continuing the early college high school program and the pathways in technology early college high school program in this state; and making an appropriation therefor
